projects.name: Todo List
projects.description: ToDo List is a server-side rendered web application. built with node, express. Used EJS for views (frontend) and MongoDB for the database.

projects.name: Food Recipe
projects.description: React app to search food recipes based on ingredients.

projects.name: Video Browser
projects.description: Video Browser is a clone of youtube. It is built using ReactJS and semantic UI. The project uses youtube api to fetch videos. Video Browser is built using class-based components of ReactJS.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Weather App is a web application that retrieves weather data of a city and shows it to the user based on the user's search query using OpenWeatherMap API. The frontend is built with ReactJS.

projects.name: Newsletter Signup
projects.description: Newsletter Signup is a backend application built using NodeJS, and ExpressJS which is used to signup users for newsletters. Mailchimp API is used in the project.

projects.name: Shopping Cart - Redux
projects.description: It is a basic shopping cart built using Redux state management library. Allows you to add, remove items from cart.

projects.name: FullScreen Video Landing Page
projects.description: Landing Page for a Gym Website. Working Out delivers oxygen and nutrients to your tissues and helps your cardiovascular system work more efficiently. Used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap.

projects.name: Simon Game
projects.description: Simon is an electronic game of short-term memory skills. The device creates a series of tones and lights and requires a user to repeat the sequence.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: Body mass index is a value derived from the mass and height of a person. The BMI is defined as the body mass divided by the square of the body height, and is expressed in units of kg/m¬≤.

projects.name: Tindog üêï - Website
projects.description: Tindog is landing page for tinder clone for dogs. Dogs love dating too. Built with HTML, CSS, BOOTSTRAP.
